price: Na wanapo guswa na mpulizo mmoja tu wa adhabu itokayo kwa Mola wako Mlezi, bila ya shaka wao husema: Ole wetu! Hakika tulikuwa wenye kudhulumu.
arabic: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتۡهُمۡ نَفۡحَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Na kuwa na yakini kuwa nao wakisibiwa hata na chembe ya adhabu ndogo wanayo ifanyia maskhara, hupiga kelele kwa khofu wakisema: Ole wetu! Hakika sisi tulikuwa tunajidhulumu nafsi zetu, na tukiwadhulumu wenginewe, tulipo yakataa tuliyo ambiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wala-in massathum nafḥatun min ʿadhābi rabbika layaqūlunna yāwaylanā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
